name: NonUnitalSubalgebra.instTopologicalSemiring
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : CommSemiring R
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝² : NonUnitalSemiring A
inst✝¹ : Module R A
inst✝ : TopologicalSemiring A
s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A
⊢ TopologicalSemiring (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem s x)
decl:
instance instTopologicalSemiring (s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A) : TopologicalSemiring s :=
  s.toNonUnitalSubsemiring.instTopologicalSemiring

name: NonUnitalSubalgebra.le_topologicalClosure
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁵ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : NonUnitalSemiring A
inst✝² : Module R A
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSemiring A
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul R A
s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A
⊢ LE.le s s.topologicalClosure
decl:
theorem le_topologicalClosure (s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A) : s ≤ s.topologicalClosure :=
  subset_closure

name: NonUnitalSubalgebra.isClosed_topologicalClosure
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁵ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : NonUnitalSemiring A
inst✝² : Module R A
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSemiring A
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul R A
s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A
⊢ IsClosed ↑s.topologicalClosure
decl:
theorem isClosed_topologicalClosure (s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A) :
    IsClosed (s.topologicalClosure : Set A) := isClosed_closure

name: NonUnitalSubalgebra.topologicalClosure_minimal
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁵ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : NonUnitalSemiring A
inst✝² : Module R A
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSemiring A
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul R A
s t : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A
h : LE.le s t
ht : IsClosed ↑t
⊢ LE.le s.topologicalClosure t

name: NonUnitalSubalgebra.instTopologicalRing
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝² : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝¹ : Module R A
inst✝ : TopologicalRing A
s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A
⊢ TopologicalRing (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem s x)
decl:
instance instTopologicalRing (s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A) : TopologicalRing s :=
  s.toNonUnitalSubring.instTopologicalRing

name: NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental.self_mem
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalSemiring A
inst✝⁵ : Module R A
inst✝⁴ : IsScalarTower R A A
inst✝³ : SMulCommClass R A A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSemiring A
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul R A
x : A
⊢ Membership.mem (NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental R x) x
decl:
@[aesop safe apply (rule_sets := [SetLike])]
theorem self_mem (x : A) : x ∈ elemental R x :=
  le_topologicalClosure _ <| self_mem_adjoin_singleton R x

name: NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental.le_of_mem
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalSemiring A
inst✝⁵ : Module R A
inst✝⁴ : IsScalarTower R A A
inst✝³ : SMulCommClass R A A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSemiring A
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul R A
x : A
s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A
hs : IsClosed ↑s
hx : Membership.mem s x
⊢ LE.le (NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental R x) s
decl:
variable {R} in
theorem le_of_mem {x : A} {s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A} (hs : IsClosed (s : Set A)) (hx : x ∈ s) :
    elemental R x ≤ s :=
  topologicalClosure_minimal _ (adjoin_le <| by simpa using hx) hs

name: NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental.le_iff_mem
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalSemiring A
inst✝⁵ : Module R A
inst✝⁴ : IsScalarTower R A A
inst✝³ : SMulCommClass R A A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSemiring A
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul R A
x : A
s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A
hs : IsClosed ↑s
⊢ Iff (LE.le (NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental R x) s) (Membership.mem s x)
decl:
variable {R} in
theorem le_iff_mem {x : A} {s : NonUnitalSubalgebra R A} (hs : IsClosed (s : Set A)) :
    elemental R x ≤ s ↔ x ∈ s :=
  ⟨fun h ↦ h (self_mem R x), fun h ↦ le_of_mem hs h⟩

name: NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental.isClosed
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalSemiring A
inst✝⁵ : Module R A
inst✝⁴ : IsScalarTower R A A
inst✝³ : SMulCommClass R A A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSemiring A
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul R A
x : A
⊢ IsClosed ↑(NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental R x)
decl:
instance isClosed (x : A) : IsClosed (elemental R x : Set A) :=
  isClosed_topologicalClosure _

name: NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental.instCompleteSpaceSubtypeMemNonUnitalSubalgebra
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : CommSemiring R
A : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : UniformSpace A
inst✝⁶ : CompleteSpace A
inst✝⁵ : NonUnitalSemiring A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSemiring A
inst✝³ : Module R A
inst✝² : IsScalarTower R A A
inst✝¹ : SMulCommClass R A A
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul R A
x : A
⊢ CompleteSpace (Subtype fun x_1 => Membership.mem (NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental R x) x_1)
decl:
instance {A : Type*} [UniformSpace A] [CompleteSpace A] [NonUnitalSemiring A]
    [TopologicalSemiring A] [Module R A] [IsScalarTower R A A]
    [SMulCommClass R A A] [ContinuousConstSMul R A] (x : A) :
    CompleteSpace (elemental R x) :=
  isClosed_closure.completeSpace_coe

name: NonUnitalAlgebra.elemental.isClosedEmbedding_coe
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalSemiring A
inst✝⁵ : Module R A
inst✝⁴ : IsScalarTower R A A
inst✝³ : SMulCommClass R A A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSemiring A
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul R A
x : A
⊢ Topology.IsClosedEmbedding Subtype.val
decl:
/-- The coercion from an elemental algebra to the full algebra is a `IsClosedEmbedding`. -/
theorem isClosedEmbedding_coe (x : A) : Topology.IsClosedEmbedding ((↑) : elemental R x → A) where
  eq_induced := rfl
  injective := Subtype.coe_injective
  isClosed_range := by simpa using isClosed R x
